text: Ger Hegarty (born 1966 in Limerick, Ireland) is a retired Irish sportsperson. He played hurling with his local club Old Christians and was a member of the Limerick senior inter-county team in the 1980s and 1990s. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Old Christians hurlers Category:Limerick inter-county hurlers Category:Munster inter-provincial hurlers
title: Ger Hegarty
